subject: Track and Field
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: An accident involving Leroy Dixon cost his 4x100-meter relay team a victory in the USA vs. the World competition, the feature of the closing day of the 114th Penn Relays.
snippet: An accident involving Leroy Dixon cost his 4x100-meter relay team a victory in the USA vs. the World competition, the feature of the closing day of the 114th Penn Relays.
